name: Colored Crystals
description:
Use the power of the color crystals to take down the menacing colored Aliens. But remember they are weak to the opposite color.

- Red kills Green
- Green kills Blue
- Blue kills Red

Kill every one of them to save the world!

Controls

- Move the hero with A, W, S and D
- Use the Left Mouse Button to shot 
- Use the Right Mouse Button or 1, 2 and 3 to cycle between colors.

Best played in fullscreen mode!
